title: I'm a Celebrity...The Daily Drop
overview: Getting excited for the return of I'm A Celebrity...? Well we've got some BRILLIANT news for you!This year we're bringing you even more fun from Camp, with the arrival of I'm A Celebrity…The Daily Drop, a brand-new companion show for I'm A Celebrity…Get Me Out Of Here! that will air exclusively on the ITV Hub.Hosted by Vick Hope from a virtual studio, the show will give fans an extra opportunity to delve deeper into the action from Camp, hear lively opinions and debates and get all the latest gossip. Brand new episodes will be available exclusively on the ITV Hub from 7am the morning after each main show airs and can be watched at any time.On I'm A Celebrity…The Daily Drop, fans will be able to catch up on all the daily events from the castle and hear them discussed, debated and dissected by Vick and a lively panel of guests. Once the celebrities start to leave the castle they'll also join Vick on The Daily Drop to share their experiences of life in camp.The show will also be repeated on ITV2 after it's dropped on the ITV Hub.
